Title: Kac Wawa
Writer: Piotr Czaja, Jacek Samojlowicz, Krzysztof Weglarz
Actors: Borys Szyc, Sonia Bohosiewicz, Roma Gasiorowska, Miroslaw Zbrojewicz
Plot: Five buddies take part in a crazy bachelor party of one of them. Meanwhile, the bride and her female friends have a nice time with male strippers. The parties get totally wild and out of control.
